mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.capital_type AS "capitalType", a.capital_category AS "capitalCategory", a.status AS "status", a.amount AS "amount", a.surplus_amount AS "surplusAmount", a.matched_amount AS "matchedAmount", a.rate AS "rate", a.nper AS "nper", a.customer AS "customer", a.urgent AS "urgent", a.stick_top AS "stickTop", a.invest_time AS "investTime", a.matched_time AS "matchedTime", a.freeze_time AS "freezeTime", a.thaw_time AS "thawTime", a.source_capital_id AS "sourceCapitalId", a.custom_weight AS "customWeight", a.weight AS "weight", a.capital_source AS "capitalSource", a.capital_product AS "capitalProduct", a.projected_earnings AS "projectedEarnings", a.matching_pen_number AS "matchingPenNumber", a.capital_code AS "capitalCode", a.user_id AS "userId", a.back_end_date AS "backEndDate", a.interest_date AS "interestDate", a.finance_id AS "financeId", a.quit_time AS "quitTime"

tc.id AS 'capitalId', tf.`name` AS 'financeName', tf.finance_code AS 'financeCode', CONCAT( SUBSTRING(tu.mobile, 1, 3), '****', SUBSTRING(tu.mobile, 8, 4) ) AS 'mobile', CONCAT(SUBSTRING(tu.realName, 1, 1), '**') AS 'userName', tc.capital_code AS 'capitalCode', tc.invest_time AS 'capitalInvestTime', tc.amount AS 'capitailAmount', CASE WHEN DATE_FORMAT(tc.quit_time, '%Y-%m-%d') < tc.back_end_date THEN '是' ELSE '否' END AS 'earlyExit',

tf.lending_method AS 'lendingMethod', tc.source_capital_id AS 'capitalSource', CASE WHEN (tc.`status` IN ('2','3','5') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') < tc.back_end_date) THEN 'beforeBack' WHEN (tc.`status` IN ('2','3','5') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= tc.back_end_date) THEN 'afterBack' ELSE tc.`status` END AS 'capitalStatus'

CASE WHEN tf.`lending_method` = '1' THEN '本金复投' WHEN tf.`lending_method` = '2' THEN '本息复投' ELSE '' END AS 'lendingMethod', CASE WHEN tc.`source_capital_id` = '0' THEN 'PC端' WHEN tc.`source_capital_id` = '1' THEN 'APP端' WHEN tc.`source_capital_id` = '2' THEN 'M站' ELSE '' END AS 'capitalSource', CASE WHEN tc.`status` = '1' THEN '匹配中' WHEN tc.`status` = '6' THEN '匹配失败' WHEN (tc.`status` IN ('2','3','5') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') < tc.back_end_date) THEN '收益中（未到期）' WHEN (tc.`status` IN ('2','3','5') AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= tc.back_end_date) THEN '收益中（已到期）' WHEN tc.`status` = '7' THEN '退出中' WHEN tc.`status` = '4' THEN '已结束' ELSE '' END AS 'capitalStatus'
mapper.select:
SELECT tc.projected_earnings AS 'projectedEarnings', tc.back_end_date AS 'endDate', tc.quit_time AS 'quitTime', tc.real_quit_time AS 'realQuitTime', tc.paid_income AS 'paidIncome', tc.returned_funds AS 'returnedFunds',
FROM t_capital tc JOIN t_finance tf ON tf.id = tc.finance_id JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = tc.user_id WHERE tc.id = #{id}

SELECT (@rowNO := @rowNo + 1) AS rowNO, fs.* FROM ( SELECT
FROM t_capital tc JOIN t_finance tf ON tf.id = tc.finance_id JOIN t_user tu ON tu.id = tc.user_id
ORDER BY capitalInvestTime ) fs, (SELECT @rowNO := 0) b LIMIT 20000
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_capital( id, capital_type, capital_category, status, amount, surplus_amount, matched_amount, rate, nper, customer, urgent, stick_top, invest_time, matched_time, freeze_time, thaw_time, source_capital_id, custom_weight, weight, capital_source, capital_product, projected_earnings, matching_pen_number, capital_code, user_id, back_end_date, interest_date, finance_id, quit_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{capitalType}, #{capitalCategory}, #{status}, #{amount}, #{surplusAmount}, #{matchedAmount}, #{rate}, #{nper}, #{customer}, #{urgent}, #{stickTop}, #{investTime}, #{matchedTime}, #{freezeTime}, #{thawTime}, #{sourceCapitalId}, #{customWeight}, #{weight}, #{capitalSource}, #{capitalProduct}, #{projectedEarnings}, #{matchingPenNumber}, #{capitalCode}, #{userId}, #{backEndDate}, #{interestDate}, #{financeId}, #{quitTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_capital SET capital_type = #{capitalType}, capital_category = #{capitalCategory}, status = #{status}, amount = #{amount}, surplus_amount = #{surplusAmount}, matched_amount = #{matchedAmount}, rate = #{rate}, nper = #{nper}, customer = #{customer}, urgent = #{urgent}, stick_top = #{stickTop}, invest_time = #{investTime}, matched_time = #{matchedTime}, freeze_time = #{freezeTime}, thaw_time = #{thawTime}, source_capital_id = #{sourceCapitalId}, custom_weight = #{customWeight}, weight = #{weight}, capital_source = #{capitalSource}, capital_product = #{capitalProduct}, projected_earnings = #{projectedEarnings}, matching_pen_number = #{matchingPenNumber}, capital_code = #{capitalCode}, user_id = #{userId}, back_end_date = #{backEndDate}, interest_date = #{interestDate}, finance_id = #{financeId}, quit_time = #{quitTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: select tfp.id AS 'value', tfp.name AS 'label' from t_finance_product tfp order by tfp.order_num
mapper.sql:
SELECT ti.`id` AS 'investId', tb.`loanNumber` AS 'loanNumber', ti.`investCode` AS 'investCode', ti.`investTime` AS 'investTime', tm.`create_time` AS 'matchedTime', ti.`investAmount` AS 'investAmount',
CASE WHEN ti.`flag` = '1' AND ti.`invest_status` = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') < DATE_FORMAT(ti.interestAccrualDate, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN '10' WHEN ti.`flag` = '1' AND ti.`invest_status` = '0' AND DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(ti.interestAccrualDate, '%Y-%m-%d') THEN '11' WHEN ti.`flag` = '1' AND ti.`invest_status` <> '0' THEN ti.`invest_status` ELSE '12' END AS 'investStatus',
ti.interestAccrualDate AS 'interestDate' FROM t_capital tc JOIN t_matched tm ON tm.`capital_id` = tc.`id` JOIN t_invest ti ON ti.`id` = tm.`invest_id` JOIN t_borrow tb ON tb.`BORROW_ID` = ti.`borrowId`
mapper.select: SELECT tidb.`billNum` AS 'billNum', tidb.`stcapi` AS 'stcapi', tidb.`sinte` AS 'sinte', tidb.`stcapi` + tidb.`sinte` AS 'sAmount', tidb.`sDate` AS 'sDate', tidb.`payoffFlag` AS 'payoffFlag' FROM t_invest_deserve_benefits tidb WHERE tidb.`investId` = #{investId} ORDER BY tidb.`billNum`
